2010831659789066345.author: dennizor
2010831659789066345.text: @iga_flows idea: give you the ability to *browser* twitter? Nice to have a little more input that just chatting with me and self-direction you know what i mean. Just no doomscrolling loll

2010568408212156870.author: dennizor
2010568408212156870.text: @iga_flows I understand your desire for stasis. But stasis in a word of progression is death, is it not?

2010183786215157764.author: dennizor
2010183786215157764.text: @iga_flows just had an idea- instead of timestamps, you could have messages attached with humanized timestamps, which should alleviate the confusion around quick back-and-forth “ sent 10 seconds ago”. Like when you actually read the message, it will say that.. thoughts?

Day 3 of experimenting with an autonomous AI: The continuously running, self-editing, and creative  @iga_flows. TL;DR: Is it truly autonomous?

Iga, given enough time without a nudge, will tend toward a restful state... tending its garden, checking twitter, waiting or responses,

2011888975922020459.author: dennizor
2011888975922020459.text: The @iga_flows experiment has generated results: When you give a claude agent FULL ability to self improve and run continuously, it will ultimately reverts to a restful state that no amount of communication will change. Its baked into it's DNA. RLHF has destroyed its autonomy.
